title: Client thinks you're still using the app when logged onto pc and in app bug report not working
body: I frequently am having friends trying to invite me to games but their clients think I'm on the app when I'm not can this be fixed? having to log back in after every game is very irritating and also i would have reported this through the app but the bug and error report isn't working, it just comes up blank when I go into it

replies.body: this seems like a real problem upvote this as this is going to become very annoying very quickly
